src:
Exclusif : Pep Guardiola Attaque La Star De Liverpool Sadio Mane Qu’il Traite De
02 Nov 2019, 21:09 by La redaction
Pep Guardiola a attisé les flammes avant le choc de la semaine prochaine entre le champion de Premier League, Manchester City, et le leader de la ligue, Liverpool, en accusant l’attaquant vedette des Reds, Sadio Mane, de plongeur(dans la surface de réparation pour simuler et obtenir un penalty précise sunubuzz).
text:
Exclusive: Pep Guardiola Attacks The Liverpool Star Sadio Mane That He Treats Of
02 Nov 2019, 21:09 by The editorial team
Pep Guardiola fanned the flames before next week's clash between Premier League champion Manchester City and Liverpool league leader Liverpool, accusing Reds star striker Sadio Mane (in the box) repair to simulate and get an accurate sunubuzz penalty).
